rationale: The agent's diff is identical to the ground truth diff. Both remove exactly the same two lines (cluster.routing.allocation.balance.replica and cluster.routing.allocation.balance.primary) from the same four locations across the same four test files: AwarenessAllocationTests.java (lines 211-212 and 736-737), ShardsLimitAllocationTests.java (lines 142-143), and TenShardsOneReplicaRoutingTests.java (lines 44-45). The changes are correct, complete, and follow the exact same approach as the ground truth. No additional files were created, no unsolicited documentation was added, and the minimal nature of the changes (simple line deletions) matches the ground truth perfectly. The only difference is in the commit hash representation in the diff headers, which is cosmetic.
ground_truth_patch:

@@ -209,8 +209,6 @@ public class AwarenessAllocationTests extends ESAllocationTestCase {
